name: Plutolabs
tag_list: iphone-app, iphone-application, android-app, android-application, windows-mobile-app, windows-mobile-application, software-development, app-development, app-developers, application-developers, seo, web-development, web-application, web-application-develop
overview:
At Pluto Labs we saw the potential of mobile computing and smartphones early and put together a team of highly qualified engineers and designersâ€”a team that can think ahead of the curve and deliver technological solutions that take advantage of device capabilities as well as conform to all user expectations.

We started off focusing on iPhone development and gained valuable experience, as well as reputation, through the release of some popular iPhoneapplications. As other platforms began to respond to the paradigm created by Apple in the smartphone industry, Pluto labs was quick to respond to the changes, adding formidable technical skills as well as development and design experience in all major smartphone platforms such as Android, BlackBerry, as well as the ever-evolving Windows Mobile.

Today, we still deploy the occasional iPhone or Android app of our own, mainly to demonstrate our technical and design capabilities in these platforms for our potential clients and for our business partners. As the platforms evolve, with changes to hardware features, and changes in mobile Operating System versions, we find it helps to assure our clients that we know the very latest too.

But Pluto Labs primarily focuses on mobile application development for our clientsâ€”making it one of the largest firms in this business, as well as one of the most reputed. We are also the ones ahead of the curveâ€”if a new platform comes up, opening up new opportunities for your app or business, or if the existing iPhone (or BlackBerry or Android) platform evolves in ways that would benefit your existing app or business, get in touch with us, and our engineers who are always up to date and are eager to try out new technologyâ€”we will help you figure out the next steps.

Count on Pluto Labs to deliver the latest technology, and the best-in-the-industry user interface design. We specialize in application development for smartphones and other mobile computing devices, and are passionate about delivering our best alwa

Pluto Labs focuses on highly qualitative, timely delivered and cost-effective offshore software development. With a rich and varied experience in providing offshore software development and project management capabilities and stringent quality standards ensure us to develop solutions that give your business an edge over your competitors. Our global software outsourcing model makes sure we deliver maximum targeted result to YOU.
